name: Geo Linkage
description: Link areas to applications and labor tasks for spatial tracking and analysis.

prd.problemStatement: Understanding what work was done where requires linking spatial data with applications and labor tasks. Geo linkage enables spatial analysis and compliance.
userStories: As a superintendent, I want areas linked to applications so that I can track what was applied where
As a superintendent, I want spatial queries so that I can analyze work patterns by area
